page.description: Allows you to store arbitrary data in the Grid Component's 'state' object.

argument.name: obj
argument.description: A JSON object that specifies what data you want to store in the state object.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The data in the 'state' object is submitted along with the data in the Grid controls every time you submit the Grid, or make an Ajax callback. The data will be in the __si2 variable.
TIP: If you are using Xbasic to construct the Javascript .setStateInfo() command in an Ajax callback, you might find the Xbasic varToJSON() function to be useful. For example:
section.example: dim ar as p ar.myvar1 = "value for myvar1" ar.myvar2 = "value or myvar2" dim jscmd as c '.t. flag condenses JSON object to a single line jscmd = "{grid.object}.setStateInfo(" + varToJSON(ar,.f.,.t.) + ");"
